Redirected to the managedBuilder guru.
Pleaser reassign to me, if this is not yours.
*** Bug 59616 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 59593 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed this by changing the way that targets are defined for GNU projects on 
POSIX systems. It is now possible to create an AIX managed build project, add 
files to it, and build.
